publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4582 Maureen Macmillan: UNICEF Award for Raigmore Midwives—That the Parliament congratulates the staff in the maternity unit at Raigmore Hospital, Inverness, supported by NHS Highland’s Public Health Directorate, on their hard work in achieving the UNICEF UK Baby Friendly Hospital Award; notes the strong commitment made by NHS Highland to encourage and support breastfeeding and recognises that this award is a key component of action on breastfeeding; further notes that there are around 1,900 babies born at Raigmore every year and that at present over 60% of new mums at Raigmore are breastfeeding successfully, and wishes the whole maternity team at Raigmore Hospital well in its future efforts in supporting mothers and babies and promoting successful breastfeeding.
S2M-4582 UNICEF Award for Raigmore Midwives (lodged on 20 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4582 Maureen Macmillan: UNICEF Award for Raigmore Midwives—That the Parliament congratulates the staff in the maternity unit at Raigmore Hospital, Inverness, supported by NHS Highland’s Public Health Directorate, on their hard work in achieving the UNICEF UK Baby Friendly Hospital Award; notes the strong commitment made by NHS Highland to encourage and support breastfeeding and recognises that this award is a key component of action on breastfeeding; further notes that there are around 1,900 babies born at Raigmore every year and that at present over 60% of new mums at Raigmore are breastfeeding successfully, and wishes the whole maternity team at Raigmore Hospital well in its future efforts in supporting mothers and babies and promoting successful breastfeeding. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
S2M-4582 UNICEF Award for Raigmore Midwives (lodged on 20 June 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
